headline: Goldman Sachs upgrades Valero on improved margin outlook, balanced valuation
summary: Investing.com -- Goldman Sachs upgraded Valero Energy Corp (NYSE:VLO) to "Neutral" from "Sell," pointing to improved long-term margin potential and a more balanced valuation. The brokerage set a new price target of $127, implying a total return of 15%.
